invstring.description: the bolt11 form, but the final signature is ignored. Minimal sanity checks are done. (Note: if **experimental-offers** is enabled, *invstring* can actually be an unsigned bolt12 invoice)

label.description: a unique string or number (which is treated as a string, so `01` is different from `1`); it is never revealed to other nodes on the lightning network, but it can be used to query the status of this invoice

preimage.description: the preimage to supply upon successful payment of the invoice
